Material.Name: material
Material.Components: diamond dust worth at least 100 gp, which the spell consumes

Spell.Name: Greater Restoration
Spell.Description: You imbue a creature you touch with positive energy to undo a debilitating effect. You can reduce the target’s exhaustion level by one, or end one of the following effects on the target: • One effect that charmed or petrified the target • One curse, including the target’s attunement to a cursed magic item • Any reduction to one of the target’s ability scores • One effect reducing the target’s hit point maximum
